title: How Many Calories in Cornbread?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in cornbread per slice, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
assumptions: Standard homemade cornbread; 1 slice â‰ˆ60 g; baked with cornmeal, flour, eggs, milk, and a bit of sugar; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand, portion size, and ingredients like added fats or sweeteners. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of cornbread contains about 188 kcal and 31 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of cornbread?
faqs.a: Approximately 188 kcal for a standard 60 g slice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in cornbread?
faqs.a: About 31 g carbs per slice, including 1.5 g fiber.
No, around 3.9 g protein per slice; it's more carb-focused.

faqs.q: How does sodium in cornbread vary?
faqs.a: Typically 300 mg per slice, but higher in store-bought with added salt.

faqs.q: Calories in cornbread vs. other breads?
faqs.a: Similar to white bread at ~188 kcal per slice, but with more carbs from cornmeal.
